resources.string: "Skontrolujte či je Wi-Fi sieť v poriadku 1. Skontrolujte zadané heslo k Wi-Fi sieti 2. WEP a EAP nie sú podporované 3. Router nemá prístup k externej sieti 4. K verejnej Wi-Fi sieti sa nie je možné pripojiť 5. 5G sieť nie je podporovaná "
Po pripojení, alebo ak telefón nie je pripojený k čističke, stlačte spolu tlačidlo "MODE" a "LIGHT" po dobu 5s. Zvukový tón signalizuje obnovenie nastavení Wi-Fi

Millet smart home products privacy policy you through a variety of different ways to use our services, such as logging in the official website to buy millet millet intelligent hardware products, the use of millet smart home software, services on different terminals. If you share information with us (for example, by creating a millet account), we can provide you with a better service, such as displaying a higher degree of product updates and related advertising to help you connect with others or, more easily and quickly with others to share content. For this purpose, we will explain to you the way we collect and use information, and in what way you can use to protect their privacy. Our privacy policy covers the following several aspects: what information we collect. How we collect and use information. How do you provide this information selectively, and how to access and update information. Sharing, security and privacy policies and revise the scope of the information we collect information we collect two types of information: personal information (personal information that can be used to uniquely identify or contact person data) and non-personal information (ie not The data will be directly associated with any particular individual). If we non-personal information combined with personal information, in the period to keep the merger, such information will be treated as personal information. The collection and use of your communications with millet Technology Limited (hereinafter referred to as \"millet\" or \"us\") when its affiliates interact, you may be asked how we collect and use personal information to provide the information you agree to use our basic certain personal information necessary goods and services. The personal information may be combined with other information, to be used to improve our products or services. The following is the type of millet may collect personal information, and some examples of how we use that information. Collects personal information when you create an account millet, millet software downloads and updates, register online retailers in millet phone, participate in an online survey, or participate in other interactions with millet company, we will ask you to provide personal information, including but not limited to your name, phone number, email address, mailing address, etc. When you buy millet products and services, we will collect personal information, including but not limited to: delivery details, bank account numbers, credit card details, billing address, credit checks and other financial information, contacts and communications records. When you use millet production sharing your content with family and friends, send messages and products, or invite others on the forum when millet, millet will collect personal information with the relevant people that you provide, such as your name, mailing address, e-mail address and telephone number. When you first use and activation of millet mobile devices, location information about your mobile user identification information, the mobile device and your device unique identifier will be sent to the millet. Collect the above information may also apply to your system or software update, restore factory settings and so on. Use millet personal information will strictly abide by this Privacy Policy and update content contained to use your personal information. Your personal information will only be used to determine when already collected and the purpose of your consent, if in addition to any other purpose, we will ask for your consent in advance. Personal information we collect will be used to provide you with products and services millet, process your order or fulfill the contract between you and millet, to ensure that our products and capabilities and security services, to verify your identity, prevent and investigate fraud and other misuses.
